_sText:
Zm_zerbes_green_rain_beta2

when i played zombie mod, i really getting pissed of, because most of the zm_maps are not build for unlimited ammo. so the games always end the same. the last humans defend some spots where no zombie can get in. thats the cause why i made this map.

You search the final elevator?
its directly behind the spawn xD. Only Humans can use it. when a human is on the top of the tower, a nuke starts automaticly.

You think the Spots are to hard to defend?
Yeah i know, but i was always really bored of only shooting in the same direction. on this map the gameplay should be thrilling. i think the map is very balanced^^.

You think the Map looks like a gg_map?
yeah.. omg... it looks like a gg_map... i know.... but why cant a zm-map look cool?


so have ur fun on this map and please comment and rate. :D
